content.description:
Stand start with left crimp about head height, and slanted right crimp about shoulder height. Use the good crimps (avoid the choss) and trust your feet to top out.

 Slow, balanced movement good for learning how to use friction for hands and feet. Short. V1/2

https://youtu.be/vGJX0xTpn6k
content.location: This problem is on the south side of Jelly bean boulder, which is on the NW side of "Bone Daddy Dome". Approach from the road that heads west from "Camp 4".

content.description: Height dependent. Stand start using the pocket and crimp mid face. Work up and left to the next pocket, following to the seam like dike. The height challenged may need to stack pads or jump start. Be weary of where you grab the dike on the top of the rock, some parts may be chossy *voice of experience*https://youtu.be/yvkqJXbQnRc
content.protection: One or two pads. Soft ground.
content.location: This problem is on the south side of Jelly bean boulder, which is on the NW side of "Bone Daddy Dome". Approach from the road that heads west from "Camp 4".Â

pathTokens: Big Ass Rocks- Knob Hill Bouldering

content.description: This is the boulder immediately left (SW) of Mushroom Boulder *Please take care not to climb on or damage the native art inside of mushroom boulder*.   So far only two problems exist with potential for a couple more.
